data.name: Rogue Warlords
data.detailed_description:
Warlords, massive godly constructs, have been set free upon an uninhabited island in order to do battle. Summoning troops, and emboldening them with upgrades, the last warlord left standing will be recognized as the strongest by the gods.



  • Instant Action - Start each game with an army at the ready.
  • Fast Matches - Start specializing your army from the first second and evolve rapidly.
  • Sandbox Mode - Customize nearly every aspect of the game and create wild battles.
  • Constant Combat - Battles are continuously happening. Summon units at a moments notice to reinforce your lines.
  • Units - Purchase and summon units that will add upgrades to your pool of purchasable upgrades. Cleverly manage your pool to strengthen specific abilities, or get a little bit of everything.
  • Upgrades - Purchase from a wide variety of upgrades to strengthen your army.
  • Combos - Find clever combinations of upgrades to create an overpowered army.
  • Replayability - A large number of unit types and upgrades to ensure no two games are exactly the same.
data.about_the_game:
Warlords, massive godly constructs, have been set free upon an uninhabited island in order to do battle. Summoning troops, and emboldening them with upgrades, the last warlord left standing will be recognized as the strongest by the gods.



  • Instant Action - Start each game with an army at the ready.
  • Fast Matches - Start specializing your army from the first second and evolve rapidly.
  • Sandbox Mode - Customize nearly every aspect of the game and create wild battles.
  • Constant Combat - Battles are continuously happening. Summon units at a moments notice to reinforce your lines.
  • Units - Purchase and summon units that will add upgrades to your pool of purchasable upgrades. Cleverly manage your pool to strengthen specific abilities, or get a little bit of everything.
  • Upgrades - Purchase from a wide variety of upgrades to strengthen your army.
  • Combos - Find clever combinations of upgrades to create an overpowered army.
  • Replayability - A large number of unit types and upgrades to ensure no two games are exactly the same.
data.short_description: Combine RTS combat with roguelike elements to create highly replayable and strategic action. Summon troops and purchase stacking upgrades to create a massive army of incredibly powerful troops. How massive of an army can you create?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2500K
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 900 Series+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2500K
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 900 Series+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
